name: Tactical Bodybuilding
description:
A game made in Ludum Dare 45 with the theme "you start with nothing."
You start as a scribble of nothingness, and poke your way though battles to build your ULTIMATE VESSEL OF DESTRUCTION. Drag arms, legs, and whatever else you need into yourself to beat other foes!
Made by Keith, Jovan, and Brent Bartlett
